content.en: Radiation therapy optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to optimize various aspects of radiation therapy treatment planning. These algorithms, such as the NSGA-II algorithm and the multi-objective optimization algorithm NSGA-II, are being used to optimize dose optimization, anatomy-based dose optimization, beam orientation, and fluence map optimization. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to improve the accuracy and effectiveness of radiation therapy treatment planning for conditions like prostate cancer.
content.da: Optimering af stråleterapi: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at optimere forskellige aspekter af stråleterapi planlægning. Disse algoritmer, såsom NSGA-II algoritmen og multi-objektiv optimeringsalgoritmen NSGA-II, bliver brugt til at optimere dosisoptimering, anatomi-baseret dosisoptimering, stråleorientering og optimering af fluens kort. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer, sigter forskerne mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af stråleterapi planlægningen for tilstande som prostatakræft.
